text: 4.3 Stt 9.3, Lom 14.6, 1 Ko 8.8, 10.30-31, Kol 2.20-21, Hib 13.4 Kɨli agɨnɨgabal, Bɨ okok bin ma dɨnɨgel, bin okok bɨ ma dɨnɨgel, tap mɨdup ogɨnap asɨk tep gɨnɨgel agɨnɨgabal. Pen God ne asɨkep takaw anɨb ak tek ma agup. Ne tap mɨdup okok mɨdupsek gɨlek, binɨb nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd, takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ne ak nepal okok, tap mɨdup dɨl nop tep agɨlɨg ñɨŋɨnɨgel.
